<<<<<<< HEAD
A require of agreement to the groundes of divinitie studie wherin great scholers falling, & being caught of Iewes disgrace the Gospel: & trap them to destruction. By H.B. Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
[6], 92, [4] p.
Printed by Richard Schilders], [Middelburg : 1611.
H.B. = Hugh Broughton. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A⁴ B² B-M⁴ N² [O]² . With a final errata leaf. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
